Articles.Content:
Like we click on VAB/SPH to directly load and launch a craft, let the astronaut complex be clickable to select Kerbals to be "launched".

Obviously this would need a limit, say 10 Kerbals with predefined spawn points - to avoid transporter frags.
Yes please. It's always such a hassle having to launch a commandpod, get the kerbals out, walk them away, and than recover the empty pod
That would be nice I guess. Its a hassle getting jeb into an external command seat on a booster.
